department.ch: 學務處-服務學習發展中心

remark.ch: 1.此為選課用時段，實際上課時間將由課程助教另行通知。2.因課程考量，本課程不開放外系選修，數學系學生只能選數學系服務學習課程

goal.en: Through service activities, students can cultivate empathy and mutual respect, and allow students to understand and deal with problems in daily life.
goal.ch: 讓學生透過服務活動，能培養同理心、相互尊心態，讓學生了解並著手處理日常生活中的問題。

content.en: The course content consists of two parts. (1) Labor service: work in groups to keep the department classroom environment clean and tidy. (2) Classroom reflection: sharing and discussion of service experience (final report).
content.ch: 課程內容包含兩部分。（一）勞動服務：分組維持系館教室環境整潔。 （二）課堂反思：服務經驗分享與討論(期末報告)。

grading.ch: 出席: 20％ 服務: 50％ 期末報告 30％

office_hr.ch: 星期二下午三點到四點半

flex_desc.en: The last week provides students with the opportunity to discuss and review their grades.
flex_desc.ch: 最後一週提供學生討論與查核成績。
